posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bob S
Hi Folks,

As still a relative newbie to the Vintage Card Forum, I didn't know exactly where to post my question. So, I'll start here and if there aren't any replies, I'll pick another subforum, and so on.

Actually I've got 2 questions.

1) What, if any, is the standard method of settlement for purchases/sales on the B/S/T forum.

Is it like eBay, where funds are sent first, then the product follows, or is it a matter decided between the people involed in the transaction?

2) With eBay fees, why would a seller use eBay rather than this board to sell an item?

If this seems like a dumb question, it probably is. [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/wink.gif[/IMG]

Thanks.

Bob S

Posted By: leon
This is a good question. Why don't you post it on the other -main- board? If no one answers (don't worry several will) then I will....thanks...leon...aka moderator dude
